msg_id.description: An ID for this message which is unique within the system

status.description: The status of the message, uses HTTP status codes, 0 value if unset

msg_intention.description: The purpose / intention of the message

msg_id.description: An ID for this message which is unique within the system

status.description: The status of the message, uses HTTP status codes, 0 value if unset

msg_intention.description: The purpose / intention of the message

event_name.description: The new human-readable non-unique name of the event

event_start_date.description: The event start_date (as a UTC timestamp in seconds since epoch)

items.description: The unique venue IDs to search for events in

predicted_attendance.description: The predicted attendance of the event
